name: Shadow Maker
description:
Generate beautiful, smooth shadows with direction, color, and opacity controls.


The default shadows are jarring, and creating a smooth shadow by hand can be time-consuming and difficult.


Shadow Maker makes generating smooth shadows easy.


Features:

  • Edit shadow color, direction, opacity, blur, and more
  • Default simplified editor mode
  • Advanced mode with bezier curve editing
